pullRequest.title: CLDR-13576 Add Ligurian core data
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist

 Issue filed: https://unicode-org.atlassian.net/browse/CLDR-13576
 Updated PR title and link in previous line to include Issue number

Comments

Ran tests as decribed in http://cldr.unicode.org/development/running-tests:

ant datacheck passes.
ant unittestExhaustive has no new failures compared to base revision. Detailed results here.

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		<coverageVariable key="%language80" value="(doi|a([fkmrz]|gq|s[at]?)|b([gm-os]|as|e[mz]?|rx?)|c([aosy]|cp|eb?|gg|hr|kb)|d([ez]|av?|je|sb|ua|yo)|e([elnos-u]|bu|wo)|f([afory]|il?|ur)|fa_AF|g([adlv]|sw|uz?)|h([eirtuy]|aw?|mn|sb)|i[adgist]|j([av]|go|mc)|k([imnuwy]|a[bm]?|de|ea|hq|kj?|ln?|ok?|s[bfh]?)|l([bgnotv]|ag?|ij|kt|rc|u[oy]?)|m([iklr-ty]|a[is]|er|fe|g[ho]?|ni?|u[al]|zn)|n([bel]|aq|ds?|mg|nh?|us|yn?)|o[mrs]|p([alst]|cm)|qu|r([mnu]|of?|wk?)|s([dgiklnoqrt-w]|a[hqt]?|bp|e[hs]?|hi|mn?)|t([ag-ikort]|eo?|wq|zm)|u([gkrz]|nd)|v([i]|ai|un)|w(ae|o)|x(h|og)|y([io]|av|ue)|z([hu]|gh|xx))"/>
          
          
            
            		<coverageVariable key="%language80" value="(doi|a([fkmrz]|gq|s[at]?)|b([gm-os]|as|e[mz]?|rx?)|c([aosy]|cp|eb?|gg|hr|kb)|d([ez]|av?|je|sb|ua|yo)|e([elnos-u]|bu|wo)|f([afory]|il?|ur)|fa_AF|g([adlv]|sw|uz?)|h([eirtuy]|aw?|mn|sb)|i[adgist]|j([av]|go|mc)|k([imnuwy]|a[bm]?|de|ea|hq|kj?|ln?|ok?|s[bfh]?)|l([bgnotv]|ag?|kt|rc|u[oy]?)|m([iklr-ty]|a[is]|er|fe|g[ho]?|ni?|u[al]|zn)|n([bel]|aq|ds?|mg|nh?|us|yn?)|o[mrs]|p([alst]|cm)|qu|r([mnu]|of?|wk?)|s([dgiklnoqrt-w]|a[hqt]?|bp|e[hs]?|hi|mn?)|t([ag-ikort]|eo?|wq|zm)|u([gkrz]|nd)|v([i]|ai|un)|w(ae|o)|x(h|og)|y([io]|av|ue)|z([hu]|gh|xx))"/>
          
      
    
    
  

@jeanm  Missed this. Please revert this line- this says, "everyone ought to translate the term Ligurian".  Please don't mandate that yet.

 		<coverageVariable key="%language60_TD" value="(shu|dzg|kbl|mde|mua|sba)"/>

afterCommit.message:
CLDR-13576 Add Ligurian core data

Co-authored-by: Steven R. Loomis <srl295@gmail.com>

nodes.bodyText: If there is grammar info, check it, even if it's in seed. (there's no seed/supplemental/* )

Thought i fixed this before. Basically, this makes sure we get some details about what locales were missing, not just 'assert failed'.
The issue here was that this PR had incorrectly added lij to language80 coverage rules. That's no longer in this PR, but this makes sure that the resulting err is clear.
we still assert, but print the warning first before bailing out
